Earthstone Energy Inc ( NYSEMKT:ESTE ) and Valley Resources , LLC:Enteres into a definitive exchange agreement under which Earthstone will acquire all of the subsidiaries of Oak Valley.Acquisition includes , producing assets , undeveloped acreage , and about $ 138 million of cash , in exchange for about 9.1 million shares of common stock of Earthstone.The specified amount of cash represents existing cash on hand plus $ 107 million of capital commitments available to Oak Valley from its members in accordance with the terms of its limited liability company agreement ..
